Class ConfigurationActionLoader

extends java.lang.Object
    Loads action instances from configuration.

      • getConfiguredActions

        public IAction[] getConfiguredActions(AbstractRig.ActionType type)
        Returns the configured action classes for a particular action type.
        Parameters:
        type - action type
        Returns:
        configured action type instances

      • loadActions

        private IAction[] loadActions(java.lang.String conf,
                    AbstractRig.ActionType type)
        Parses the configuration string and attempts to load the classes. Class resolution first attempts to load the class directly then successively tries each configured package.
        Parameters:
        conf - configuration string with classes separated with ';'
        type - action type to print errors
        Returns:
        list of action classes, empty list of none found
